articles.title: India’s leader promises trade and investment in a visit to Trinidad and Tobago - AP News
articles.description: Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi has promised continued trade and investment in Trinidad and Tobago in an address to the nation’s parliament. Modi said Friday that's “it’s time for us to work together to give the global south its rightful seat at the table…
articles.content:
PORT-OF-SPAIN, Trinidad (AP) Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi promising continued trade and investment in Trinidad and Tobago on Friday in an address to the nations parliament.
